org.eclipse.nvplayout.controller

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.nvplayout.controller.MainController

  • public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
    MainController is the Main controller Use to link the specific view to the specific controller.

    Based on a MVC model

    Version:
    0.0 Alpha EarlyAccess Beta Tester
    Author:
    GLI feat Software Team
    See Also:
    CalibrationController, MemoryConfigurationController

      • calibrationsetDataDisplay

        public void calibrationsetDataDisplay(int iDisplay)
        Modify the format of how the variable is display for calibration section. hexadecimal = 0, decimal = 1.
        Parameters:
        iDisplay - Int : New format wanted.
        See Also:
        CalibrationController.setDataDisplay(int)

        See Also:
        CalibrationController.getheaderVariable()

      • calibrationgetAllVariable

        public java.lang.String[][] calibrationgetAllVariable()
        Return the double array containing all the data of all the variable, of the current active block for calibration section. Variable in row and data in column.
        Returns:
        String[][] : Double array of string containing all the information.
        See Also:
        CalibrationController.getAllVariable()

      • calibrationsetData

        public boolean calibrationsetData(int variable,
                                  int info,
                                  java.lang.String data)
        Update one data of one variable of the active block for calibration section.
        Parameters:
        variable - Int : The ID of the variable, for which we send the ask to modify one data of it
        info - Int : The data ask for modification
        data - String : Value for the update
        Returns:
        boolean : true if the modification are set, false if not
        See Also:
        CalibrationController.setData(int, int, java.lang.String)

      • memoryConfigurationgetStartAddress

        public java.lang.String[] memoryConfigurationgetStartAddress()
        Return an array of address of each memory section.
        Returns:
        String[] : Array of address of each memory section. [CALIBRATION ADDRESS; RAM SHADOW ADDRESS; ROM ADDRESS; EEPROM ALIAS ADDRESS]
        See Also:

      • memoryConfigurationgetMemorySize

        Returns:
        String[] : Size of the calibration section. [CALIBRATION SIZE]
        See Also:
        MemoryConfigurationController.getMemorySize()

      • memoryConfigurationgetVersion

        public java.lang.String[] memoryConfigurationgetVersion()
        Return an array of version of calibration section.
        Returns:
        String[] : Address of the calibration section. [MAJOR VERSION; MINOR VERSION; SUBVERSION]
        See Also:
        MemoryConfigurationController.getVersion()

      • memoryConfigurationsetDataDisplay

        public void memoryConfigurationsetDataDisplay(int iDisplay)
        Set in which format the data is return for the configuration of global memory.
        Parameters:
        iDisplay - Int : 0 = HEXADECIMALDISPLAY; 1 = DECIMALDISPLAY
        See Also:
        MemoryConfigurationController.setDataDisplay(int)

      • memoryConfigurationsetVersion

        public void memoryConfigurationsetVersion(int versionType,
                                          java.lang.String version)
        Set a new Version according the first parameter. Check the string version and change it to int one. Catch the error if the string is not align to possible one: decimal or hexadecimal with 0x.
        Parameters:
        versionType - Int : K_MAJORVERSION = 0 : K_MINORVERSION = 1 : K_SUBVERSION = 2
        version - Int : New version.
        See Also:
        MemoryConfigurationController.setVersion(int, java.lang.String)

      • memoryConfigurationsetSize

        public void memoryConfigurationsetSize(int sizeType,
                                       java.lang.String size)
        Set a new memory size according the first parameter. Check the string size and change it to int one. Catch the error if the string is not align to possible one: decimal or hexadecimal with 0x.
        Parameters:
        sizeType - Int : K_CALIBRATIONSIZE = 0 : K_RAMSHADOWSIZE = 1 : K_ROMSIZE = 2
        size - String : New size.
        See Also:
        MemoryConfigurationController.setSize(int, java.lang.String)

      • memoryConfigurationsetAddress

        public void memoryConfigurationsetAddress(int addressType,
                                          java.lang.String address)
        Set a new address according the first parameter. Set it in the global memory configuration and in the specific section.
        Parameters:
        addressType - Int : Memory section targeted.
        address - String : Start address of the wanted memory section.
        See Also:
        CalibrationController.setStartAddress(java.lang.String), MemoryConfigurationController.setAddress(int, java.lang.String)
